modName: Books Books and More Books Quest (WIP)
summary: this mod adds a few books at the moment
descriptionHtml:
I decided to add a few books to read and they are located in Riverwood Trader You Can Buy them 
the reason i put this in quest and adventures is because a am currently making a quest 
the book called AntiDash's Journal will some info for the quest i am working on 
____________________________________________________________________
\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\{WARNING}/////////////////////////////
____________________________________________________________________

The Book Rainbow Factory Is a little Messed Up you can read it but every time there is a Square for every Apostrophe
So i am re writing it to fix that problem. It also Rated M for Violence Profanity Gore 
The Rest of the Mod is Rated G
___________________________________________________________________________________________________


Right Now there is only four books
Rainbow Factory 
History: Dwemer
History: Elsweyr
AntiDash's Journal

The Journal Will Act as a Change Log And Future Plans 

The Next Thing i am adding is a NPC to Sleeping Giant INN 
He Will Give you a quest to retrieve a book called "Dwemer History"
it will be in Dwemer writing when you give him/her the book.
you will get a translated copy that will be called "The Last of the Dwemer"
when you read it you will recieve a quest  "A City Lost In The Dark"

i cannot tell you any more details about the quest because you will be able to do the quest 
with it being completely spoiled 

To Install

Extract the .rar with winrar or 7zip 
Copy the Esp of to you're data folder 
enable the mod and play


I Will Try To Update them Mod in a couple days. As Soon as i get the dungeon and quest done ill add the quest 

but little items like book potions spells and armor will be updated frequently
author: AntiDash
